content: keep cozy with this crochet blanket that s offered in full-size and baby-size versions stitched in our easy-care red heart super saver o go you ll do a fun crochet technique that looks like weaving using alternating row of 2 different o gos for the large version and 1 self-striping o go plus a solid shade for the small version this entertaining project features half_double_crochet double_crochet chain spaces and fringe techniques it s a thoughtful gift for a new mom yarns for models red heart® super saver® o go™ solids 7 oz/197 g 364 yds/333 m prints 5 oz/141 g 236 yds/215 m full size blanket contrast a peacock 7155 5 o gos contrast b newsprint 7124 5 o gos baby size blanket contrast a baby rainbow 7175 3 o gos contrast b white 7100 3 o gos
